Module com.bd
Package controller

Class LoginScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The LoginScreenController is used to log login activity and allows navigation through the program on successful authentication.
Author:
Brandi Davis

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the LoginScreenController. Retrieves the system default Zone ID and displays the timezone Checks if the French language is detected on local OS If OS language is French it will set the text to French
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for root object
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object

    • onActionLogin

      void onActionLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Logs the user into the program if credentials are found and displays error on invalid login. There are error checks for empty fields Uses the findUser() method from the UsersDao to authenticate login Writes login result to login_activity.txt file Navigates to the NavigationScreenController on successful login
      Parameters:
      event - on action login button

    • onActionExitProgram

      void onActionExitProgram(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Exits the program. LAMBDA JUSTIFICATION: With this lambda, you get immediate context and clear intent of what the lambda is performing. This is good use for this simple code Displays confirmation dialog to confirm program exit
      Parameters:
      event - on action exit button
